tests.name: racecar, taco cat
tests.output:
racecar is a palindrome
taco cat is a palindrome (ignoring spaces)

tests.name: taco cat, racecar

racecar is a palindrome (ignoring spaces)

mother is not a palindrome
mom is a palindrome (ignoring spaces)

tests.name: dad, father

dad is a palindrome
father is not a palindrome (ignoring spaces)
